Package edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.graph

Class GraphTraversalUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.graph.GraphTraversalUtil
  • public class GraphTraversalUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    GraphTraversalUtil provides a collection of behaviors for traversing graphs, including depth-first search and breadth-first search. The GraphTraversalUtil class is based on the textbook: Data Structures and Algorithms in Java, Sixth Edition Michael T. Goodrich, Roberto Tamassia, and Michael H. Goldwasser John Wiley and Sons, 2014
    Author:
    Dr. King, Tung Tran

      Returns a map of discovery edges that represent a breadth-first search traversal of the given graph from a given starting vertex.

    • Method Detail

      • depthFirstSearch

        public static <V,​E> Map<Graph.Vertex<V>,​Graph.Edge<E>> depthFirstSearch​(Graph<V,​E> graph,
                                                                                    Graph.Vertex<V> start)
        Returns a map of discovery edges that represent a depth-first search traversal of the given graph from a given starting vertex.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of data in the graph vertices
        E - the type of data in the graph edges
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph to traverse
        start - the vertex at which to start the depth-first search traversal
        Returns:
        a map of discovery edges that were used to discover vertices in the graph

      • breadthFirstSearch

        public static <V,​E> Map<Graph.Vertex<V>,​Graph.Edge<E>> breadthFirstSearch​(Graph<V,​E> graph,
                                                                                      Graph.Vertex<V> start)
        Returns a map of discovery edges that represent a breadth-first search traversal of the given graph from a given starting vertex.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of data in the graph vertices
        E - the type of data in the graph edges
        Parameters:
        graph - a graph to traverse
        start - the vertex at which to start the breadth-first search traversal
        Returns:
        a map of discovery edges that were used to discover vertices in the graph
